Waykup Twitter

Tips & Tricks

These are some tips to help you use the app in a better way.

Don't hesitate to send us an e-mail if we've missed anything.

Set your way once you are already on the go.
To optimize battery usage and avoid possible gps connection errors.
You can use Waykup while travelling by...
Bus, train, car, boat or even walking, but it will NOT work underground!
You can search by either:
Writing an address in the search field or by tapping anywhere on the map.
A pocket is a good option!
Keep your phone in a place with good signal.
Double tap for zooming in the map is disabled.
You can either "pinch to zoom" or you can activate the zoom controls in settings.
Save and share your favorite ways.
You'll find the buttons to do so in the lower right side of the screen while travelling.

If you love Waykup please take a minute and rate it in the App Store. It will be very much appreciated.
